thread.title: Rand McNally to Demo Navigation Products, Support Veterans Group at Great American Trucking Show (GATS)
thread.title_full: Rand McNally to Demo Navigation Products, Support Veterans Group at Great American Trucking Show (GATS) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Rand McNally to Demo Navigation Products, Support Veterans Group at Great American Trucking Show (GATS)
text:
Rand McNally
Drivers can win award-winning IntelliRoute® TND™ truck-specific GPS device
SKOKIE, Ill. , Aug. 21, Rand McNally is inviting all professional drivers to stop by its booth at the Great American Trucking Show (GATS) in Dallas from Aug. 27-Aug. 29, 2015 for product giveaways, informational demonstrations, show specials, and to participate in a very special donation program. All drivers are encouraged to enter daily drawings* for a chance to win an award-winning IntelliRoute® TND™ truck-specific GPS device.
Rand McNally staffers and customer support will be at booth #19112 at the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Dallas for product questions, support, and device demos, including electronic logging device (ELD)-compliant solutions, such as the HD 100 and TND™ 760.
New this year: Rand McNally will match donations* to help a not-for-profit that honors fallen veterans. For a suggested $1 donation, professional drivers can pick up a 2016 edition of Rand McNally's top-selling Motor Carriers' Road Atlas , and help benefit Wreaths Across America . In 2014, Wreaths Across America laid over 700,000 memorial wreaths at 1,000 locations in the United States and beyond, including placing more than 226,000 wreaths at Arlington National Cemetery.
Also at GATS this year:
Finalists in the Mike O'Connell Memorial Trucking's Top Rookie will receive a complimentary IntelliRoute® TND™ 730 truck GPS device and Motor Carriers' Road Atlas , and the Top Rookie winner also will receive a Deluxe Motor Carriers' Road Atlas . Rand McNally will help support Women in Trucking with a complimentary TND™ 730. In support of the GATS Driven to be Healthy Challenge, Rand McNally will donate a TND™ 730 to the grand prize winner. The Driven to be Healthy Challenge will kick off at GATS to encourage drivers to get healthy, and exercise more. For more information about Rand McNally's suite of products for commercial transportation, see www.randmcnally.com/trucking .
*Subject to terms and conditions
About Rand McNally – Rand McNally is the country's most trusted source for maps, navigation, and travel content. Products and services include: America's #1 Road Atlas; IntelliRoute® truck routing software; TND™ truck GPS; HD 100 E-Log devices; TPC 7600 and TND™ 760 mobile fleet management solutions; RVND™ GPS for RVers; and leading geography-based educational resources for the classroom. Learn more at randmcnally.com
© 2015 RM Acquisition, LLC d/b/a Rand McNally . All rights reserved.
Rand McNally , the globe design mark, IntelliRoute, and Best of the Road are registered trademarks, and TND and RVND are trademarks of RM Acquisition, LLC d/b/a Rand McNally . U.S. Patent Nos. 7,580,791 and 8,214,141.
